<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataBJ extends data { const CODE = 'BJ'; const PREFIX = 229; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '[2689]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '2(?:02|1[037]|2[45]|3[68])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:6\d|9[013-9])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '857[58]\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
